title: Can I set 2 different bedtime schedules? I'd really like to switch between weekdays and weekends.
content: I have a bedtime schedule set with a variety of actions that occur during that period for Monday thru Friday. I'd like to have an entirely different bedtime schedule for weekends. Is there a way to add another bedtime schedule?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
